title: Grad: Guided Relation Diffusion Generation for Graph Augmentation in Graph Fraud Detection
summary: Nowadays, Graph Fraud Detection (GFD) in financial scenarios has become an urgent research topic to protect online payment security. However, as organized crime groups are becoming more professional in real-world scenarios, fraudsters are employing more sophisticated camouflage strategies.
